short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Crossplatform configuration tool for tiltdrone based on Cleanflight flight control system

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Update May 10 2017:

As from this date, the 1.10 and 1.12 (in testing phase) firmwares can be configured with the official Cleanflight Configurator (https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/cleanflight-configurator/enacoimjcgeinfnnnpajinjgmkahmfgb?utm_source=gmail) except for two parameters:

1. In Configuration tab, the frame time QuadXTiltArm or OctoTiltArm

2. All the parametres in the Tilt_arm tab

Now, the instructions to use our 1.10 and 1.12 firmwares:

1. Flash the firmware with the OFICIAL Cleanflight Configurator (download link above).

2. Use OUR Tiltflight configurator (this configurator here, 1.8.7 version) to select the QuadXTiltArm or OctoTiltArm and configure the Tilt_arm tab parameters.

3. Use the OFICIAL Cleanflight Configurator to set the rest of the parameters.


HEX file for 1.10 version: https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B908uAAcXDY7V2VxaE5wRmROaFE/view?usp=sharing 

HEX file for 1.12 version: https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B908uAAcXDY7b1A1Rm1YVjVWVlE/view?usp=sharing
